topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a846166368727ab5920100#post_54a846166368727ab5920100
I never look for to them because majority are just awful

My exceptions are the mario bros movie, street fighter, and mortal kombat

Yes mario bros is stupid, but god damn it's still fun and entertaining
And let's be honest, and accurate looking, live action mario movie, would still look stupid

Street fighter was a cheesy 90s action flick, which is fine, but also every character is recognizable

And the first mortal kombat actually managed to get the story and characters mostly correct

I saw an early version of it at magfest
It was...
Unfinished... I think there was literally a part where the screen was just a blank page with "sonic running" written on it for half a second. 
Even if it had been finished, it was... Yeah...

Although while the guy who played robotnik didn't give a performance I would say was _good_ but it was certainly hella entertaining.
